txt.en: The owner of the poisonous fruit ran out of town and towards the Wildwood.\n\nYou should follow in pursuit and try to catch up with this man.
'Yes, I am quite proud of what I bring to market!'
Reconstruction work continues on Trestlebridge.\n\nYou should survey the reconstruction of Trestlebridge.
'Pardon me, are you looking for the owner of that market stall?'

'I have given some thought to our problems with Gothtal. For now, let us continue our efforts in the reconstruction of Trestlebridge and we will deal with this Gothtal when the time is right. There is still much to be done here in both Trestlebridge and the Wildwood.'
The Market of Troubles
Talk to Aran Greenwith
Aran Greenwith can be found at Trestlebridge.\n\nYou should talk to Aran Greenwith.

'I have some good news, [placeholder]. After a lot of hard work from the Woodcutter's Brotherhood and its members, Trestlebridge will soon have a monthly market day where farmers and traders will come to town, bringing their goods in tow.\n\n'To keep the town safe, the Woodcutter's Brotherhood has been vetting each vendor. Today we are talking to some of the nearby farmers from the Bree-fields. Would you like to talk to the vendor for us?'

'Yes, there was a man standing behind the market stall there. He saw you inspecting the farmers' goods and started to get nervous. I only know this because I saw him pacing. Then he walked away until he was almost out of sight, whereupon he just started running. I think he was heading in the direction of the Bree-fields. I hope that helps. Glad you like my marmalades though!'
Survey the reconstruction of Trestlebridge
The trail of footprints leads into the Wildwood
Inspect the market stalls ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat the troublesome brigand
You find the man talking to an Orc outside of Cotfast!
Talk to Aran Greenwith
Inspect the final market stall
DNT
Defeated the troublesome brigand
The market stalls of potential vendors have been set up in Trestlebridge.\n\nYou should talk to the farmer closest to the stall with the rancid fruit.
The market stalls of potential vendors have been set up in Trestlebridge.\n\nYou should inspect the produce of the farmers.
'Wait here, and if anyone followed you, kill them.'
'Mess this up Man, and I'll have your head!'
The Woodcutter's Brotherhood has agreed to help Trestlebridge bring a farmers' market to the centre of town.
The market stalls of potential vendors have been set up in Trestlebridge.\n\nYou should inspect the produce of the farmers.
The vendor can be found outside of Cotfast in the Wildwood.\n\nYou should confront the vendor.
These fruits do not look good!
DNT
Inspected the market stalls ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
DNT
'Ha, have you come to Cotfast alone?! I'm telling you nothing, [placeholder]! Gothtal has my back!'
'Gothtal, they were on to me! I swear!'
Talk to the helpful vendor
DNT
Find and follow the man's trail
You should follow in pursuit of the fleeing vendor

'Now we have a name, Gothtal. We also know this Orc frequents the outpost of Cotfast in the Wildwood. An attempt to infiltrate our market in town is a brazen effort for this Gothtal. Has he become desperate? What is his plan? I hope to find out soon, [placeholder].\n\n'Why not take some time to admire the reconstruction efforts in Trestlebridge and I will think on our next course of action.'
More of Trestlebridge has been rebuilt!
Confront the troublesome brigand
'Thank you!'
Aran Greenwith can be found at Trestlebridge.\n\nYou should talk to Aran Greenwith.
'They do look good!'
'I have plenty more to sell if you like these!'
